backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a contact form backend with functions to submit, retrieve, and delete contact submissions stored in a List.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features for updating Header and HeroSection components to use Vite asset import syntax for the logo image.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing component structure, styling, and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, featuring warm earth tones (saffron, terracotta, gold).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Kattar Sanatani Yodha (Odisha) application that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the HomePage within a minimal wrapper div.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying mission, community, and values with icon cards and a community service image.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with validation, backend submission via useContactForm hook, toast notifications, and contact information display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with organization info, quick links using smooth scroll, and attribution with UTM tracking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GetInvolvedSecti: Get Involved section displaying four participation methods in cards and a call-to-action button linking to an external membership form.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component with logo, navigation menu for sections (About, Programs, Get Involved, Contact), and responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner section with background image overlay, organization title, description, and call-to-action buttons for joining and learning more.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCard.tsx: Reusable card component that displays a program with an icon, title, and description with hover effects.
Section displaying six program cards (Cultural Preservation, Dharmic Education, Community Gatherings, Social Service, Youth Engagement, Temple Support) in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Custom hook providing contact form submission mutation using the backend actor, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom hook to fetch contact form submissions from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color tokens for saffron, terracotta, and gold branding colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main page component composing Header, Hero, About, Programs, Get Involved, Contact sections, and Footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar, chart, and Indian-inspired colors (saffron, terracotta, gold), plus typography and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for Kattar Sanatani Yodha (Odisha) non-profit website with 9 implemented features including homepage, about, programs, contact, and get-involved sections; currently has a known issue with logo and background images not displaying due to incorrect Vite asset path handling.
